data.title: NASSCOM Product Conclave 2018
data.meta_description: Check out what Suresh Sambandam will be attending at NASSCOM Product Conclave 2018
data.text:
About me

Suresh Sambandam is the Founder and CEO of OrangeScape, a rare breed of technology platform company creating products like KiSSFLOW that has 10000+ customers across 108 countries. Suresh is a tech entrepreneur with a blend of deep technology foundation and acquired experience in sales and marketing. He as 3 US patents to his credit.
